page.title: 12SPARE TIME ACTIVITIES(15_25)
page.content: We interviewed nine men between the ages 15 - 25 to find out what they do in their spare time.From the results from our surveys,it seems there are many sport facilities in our area. The most popular sports facilities are recreation grounds and lakes.The most popular places for night life are pubs and discos.We found that many people in our area watch a lot of television, the programmes they watch are Miami Vice, pop programmes, The Young Ones. The programme which has the highest percentage of people watching is Tomorrow's World.We also found that people over the age of 20 watch Tomorrow's World much more than people from 15 to 20.The few women that we interviewed seemed to join clubs and go out to places to do with keep_fit and slimming.
